wikipedia_page.main: Cliff Robinson is a British comic book artist, probably best known for his cover work on 2000 AD, and contributions to the Judge Dredd strip.

response: *Cliff Robinson (basketball, born 1960), American basketball player in the NBA from 1979 to 1991

Reuniting with Marvel UK in 1992, Jaye co-created Dark Angel with artist Geoff Senior, and wrote the Hell's Angel/Dark Angel title from 1992 to 1993. She co-created the strip Mother Earth with Paul Neary and Cliff Robinson, which ran in 2000 AD in 1993.Mother Earth profile at 2000 AD.
* (with Paul Neary and Cliff Robinson) Mother Earth, 2000 AD #867-872, 1993
